cards.title: Dynamo
setup: At the start of the game, {Dynamo} enters play 'Notorious Supercriminal' side up.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, discard the top card of the villain deck and {Dynamo} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} energy damage.
At the end of the villain turn, if there are at least 6 cards in the villain trash, {Dynamo} flips.
cards.advanced: Whenever a villain target enters play, discard the top card of the villain deck.
flippedGameplay: When Dynamo flips to this side, play the top 2 cards of the villain deck. Then, shuffle the villain trash, put it on the bottom of the villain deck, and {Dynamo} flips.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
cards.challengeText: At the start of the game, put Python and Copperhead into play. {Dynamo} is indestructible as long as there is another villain target in play.

openingLines.default: You interrupted the wrong heist, do-gooders! Prepare for pain!
openingLines.CricketCharacter: Hey pipsqueak, aren't you a little young to be playing caped crusader?
openingLines.FirstResponseCricketCharacter: Nice digs, kid. But fancy gear ain't nothing without the brains behind it.
openingLines.RenegadeCricketCharacter: Whoa, what is this? You fixing to join the gang? Or is this another one of your tricks?
openingLines.WastelandRoninCricketCharacter: Looks like you got a new edge. Wonder how it'll look broken.

cards.title: Bank Heist
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, each player may discard 1 card. If fewer than {H - 1} cards were discarded this way, discard the top card of the villain deck.

cards.title: Cathartic Demolition
body: At the start of the villain turn, destroy all Plot cards and this card.
When this card is destroyed, {Dynamo} deals each non-villain target X energy damage, where X is 2 times the number of villain cards destroyed this turn.

flavorQuotes.text: You can't rob the{BR}place if you bury it.

cards.title: Copperhead
body: If this card has 10 or fewer HP, increase damage it deals by 2.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP {H} melee damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: I've got enough to deal with right{BR}now. Don't bother me with stories, kid.

cards.title: Crime Spree
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, the players may choose to play the top card of the environment deck. If they do not, discard the top card of the villain deck and {Dynamo} deals each hero target 1 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Almost as if they wanted{BR}me to break in.

cards.title: Energy Conversion
body: When this card enters play, discard the top card of the villain deck.
When {Dynamo} is dealt 4 or more damage from a single source, discard the top card of the villain deck and {Dynamo} deals each hero target {H} energy damage. Then, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Destruction begets more{BR}destruction. Kinda poetic, init?

cards.title: Hardened Criminals
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: 'The Rogues'? Are you in a band now?

cards.title: Helmeted Charge
body: If Copperhead is in play, he deals each hero target 2 melee damage.
Otherwise, seach the villain deck and trash for Copperhead and put him into play. If you searched the villain deck, shuffle it.

cards.title: "Here's the Plan..."
body: Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a Plot is revealed. Put it into play and shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck.
The villain target with the highest HP deals each hero target {H - 1} melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: We need to get rid{BR}of that meddling kid.

cards.title: Impervious Advance
body: If Copperhead is in play, reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1 until the start of the next villain turn.
The villain target with the highest HP deals the hero target with the second highest HP {H} melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: This is why we make such a{BR}good team. Let's get him!

cards.title: Kinetic Energy Beam
body: {Dynamo} deals the hero target with the second highest HP {H} energy damage.
Increase damage dealt to that target by environment cards by 1 until the start of the next villain turn.

cards.title: Python
body: The first time a hero target deals damage to this card each turn, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of the next villain turn.
Whenever a One-shot enters the villain trash, this card deals the 2 hero targets with the lowest HP {H - 2} toxic damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: He's a lot more dangerous{BR}than you think.

cards.title: Slippery Thief
body: If Python is in play, he deals each hero target 1 toxic damage, regains {H} HP, and discards the top card of the villain deck.
The villain target with the lowest HP deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 2} melee damage.
cards.flavorText: “Good as new,” hissed the{BR}creature, as the shriveled skin fell away{BR}to reveal an undamaged limb.

cards.title: Stranglehold
body: If Python is in play, destroy {H} hero ongoing and/or equipment cards.
Otherwise, search the villain deck and trash for Python and put him into play. If you searched the villain deck, shuffle it.

flavorQuotes.text: They spliced an{BR}ordinary snake with human DNA.

cards.title: Take It Outside
body: {Dynamo} deals the hero target with the highest HP 5 energy damage. If a hero target takes damage this way, destroy 1 environment card.
{Dynamo} deals each other hero target 1 sonic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Vamoose. Take the door with you.

cards.title: Wanton Destruction
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, each player may destroy 1 of their non-character cards. If fewer than {H - 2} cards were destroyed this way, discard the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: The police have been unable{BR}to apprehend the criminals, who{BR}appear to be working in tandem.
